channel.title: 100% Legal Buds :)
channel.description:
[url=http://www.herbal-smoke-shop.com/]http://www.herbal-smoke-shop.com/[/url]
Look, legal buds!
"If you smoke bud, you are going to be AMAZED at the Taste, Smell, and Potency of our legal herbal smoke. While 100% legal, our herbs and buds will impress even the most experienced smokers."
Satisfied Customers:
Why is Herbal Smoke Shop the world's favorite smoke shop? Our products contain unique varieties of 100% legal exotic natural herbs, herbal resins, and botanicals, which work synergistically to produce a smoke that will impress even the most experienced smokers.
"A truely unique experience" - Jon, Los Angeles, CA
"All I can say is your products are awesome" - Michele, NY.NY
"HSS products are the best legal buds I have ever smoked. These products are in a class of their own, and far-exceed the quality of the competition" - Richard, New Orleans, LA
"Incredible smokes, incredible service, you have a repeat customer for life!" - Benjamin, Phoenix, AZ
Herbal Smoke Shop has been the pioneer in legal bud cultivation since 1998. We guarantee you the freshest and highest quality legal buds and herbal smoke in the world, with the fastest shipping. Our legal bud and herbal smoking blends have been purchased by tens of thousands of satisfied customers worldwide. With hundreds of thousands invested in product development, our legal buds are of the absolute HIGHEST QUALITY Smokes in the world. Do not be fooled by imitations, herbal smoke shop is the original legal bud smoke shop since 1998 for a reason.
[glow=red,2,300]I haven't officially bought from this site, but my friend has and he liked it[/glow] ;D

item.title: 100% Legal Buds :)
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:6, topic:19393”][quote author=Bebemycat2 link=topic=29508.msg341273#msg341273 date=1161589958]
Salvia is like $10 for an 1/8 though.

The thing is, it only lasts for about an hour, or atleast for me it does.
[/quote]

You only need about 1/20th of a gram if your smoking salvia10x, but of course you’d smoke more then that :P. Wtf an hour? It’s only ment to last like 5 minutes.[/quote]
I mix mine with acid and other shit sometimes. So that might have somthing to do with it

Read full topic

item.title: 100% Legal Buds :)
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:2, topic:19393”]Dude dude dude, NO NO NO NO!!!

DO NOT BUT THIS FUCKING SHIT. I bought the sample pack, the only kind worth smoking is the blueberry bud, it tastes really really good. None of these, I repeat, none of these, give you any buzz at all. They give you a throbbing headache like you wouldn’t believe, search it up on the internet and find more if you don’t believe me. Just remember, curiosity killed the cat.

If you want to get high off of something that is legal, and isn’t harmful, buy Salvia. Get 10x Salvia, and just take a hit or two and your completly out of it, it’s like nothing else.[/quote]

And you thoght I played too much GTA…

Read full topic

item.title: 100% Legal Buds :)
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Dude dude dude, NO NO NO NO!!!

DO NOT BUY THIS FUCKING SHIT. I bought the sample pack, the only kind worth smoking is the blueberry bud, it tastes really really good. None of these, I repeat, none of these, give you any buzz at all. They give you a throbbing headache like you wouldn’t believe, search it up on the internet and find more if you don’t believe me. Just remember, curiosity killed the cat.

If you want to get high off of something that is legal, and isn’t harmful, buy Salvia. Get 10x Salvia, and just take a hit or two and your completly out of it, it’s like nothing else.
